name: IMSEQ
body:
### IMSEQ IMSEQ is a **fast, PCR and sequencing error aware** tool to analyze high throughput data from recombined **T-cell receptor** or **immunoglobolin** gene **sequencing** experiments. It derives immune **repertoires** from sequencing data in FASTA / FASTQ format. ![IMSEQ Workflow](./images/imseq-flow.png) #### Getting IMSEQ You can obtain binaries and sources for the latest release, **IMSEQ 1.0**, by choosing from one of the following links: | [**IMSEQ 1.0 for Mac
(64 bit)**](binaries/imseq-1.0-mac64.tgz)
Requires Mac OS 10.9+ | **IMSEQ 1.0 for Linux
(64 bit)** | **IMSEQ Sourcecode** | ------------- | ------------- | ------------- | #### Using IMSEQ
